item.description:
The Museum hosts a gathering the first friday of every month. It includes fine art, live music, a cash bar featuring signature cocktails and a delicious tappas menu. This month will also feature special performances and instruction by the MIT ballroom dance team.

Let's join in the fun.....

We will meet at 6:30 in the lobby.....

Hope to see you all there!

http://www.mfa.org/ca...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby.
item.name: MFA First Friday
